Description: Small fragment of red open weave wool, perhaps from a woman's head-veil, a narrow simple band in black and a wider band in black and undyed cotton with a pattern of concentric hexagons.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Qasr Ibrim (Nubia), LC2-358-0 North-West Section Level 2
Acquisition name: Division of Finds: Egyptian Antiquities Organisation
